text: Ronald Lawrence Wilson (born May 28, 1955) is a former ice hockey player. He was the head coach of the Toronto Maple Leafs from 2008 to 2012. He also was the coach for the San Jose Sharks, Washington Capitals, Vancouver Canucks, and Anaheim Mighty Ducks of the NHL. Wilson was born in Windsor, Ontario, Canada. He is a citizen of both Canada and the United States. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American ice hockey defensemen Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Minnesota North Stars players Category:Ice hockey people from Windsor, Ontario Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
title: Ron Wilson (ice hockey, born 1955)
